name: Wildlife Park 2 - Fantasy
description:
It becomes fantastic! Real mythical creatures will become the main attraction in your zoo for the very first time.
White and black unicorns, saphire- and firedragons will asthonish your park visitors.

• Including Wildlife Park 2`s comprehensive sandboxmode with a bunch of decorations, plants, service-items, pen-items, terraforming, ways, grounds, fences, etc.
